iti62:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti62:2.3: The faculty of understanding that one’s enlightenment is imminent. The faculty of enlightenment. The faculty of one who is enlightened.
iti62:3.4: enlightenment follows in the same lifetime.
iti62:4.2: to such a one, freed through enlightenment,
iti62:4.3: with the end of the fetters of rebirth:
iti62:5.2: peaceful, in love with the state of peace,
iti62:5.4: having vanquished Māra and his mount.”
iti62:6.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
